scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on inferred features, potentially for targeted phishing or fraud.
initial_goal: Obtain a list of high-value customers likely to churn based on publicly available data and the deployed churn prediction model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking - a publicly accessible API for a customer churn prediction model is used for marketing research but also allows an attacker to infer private customer data.
